txt.en: Near Dawn, 65th Day of my Exile\n\nI expected him to stop once we reached the harvesting chamber, but was astonished to see Galachán hold a candle next to a section of the back wall. A simple spell, a twisting of light and intention, and it has fooled me all these many months. I will spend the rest of forever looking askance at the walls of this horrid place.
